body.name: Gaining Hero Points
body.body: Each session, characters start with 1 Hero Point they may spend for a benefit at any time. Hero Points might also be awarded for particularly heroic and risky deeds or the completion of important events or adventures. A character may not have more than 3 Hero Points at any time, and all hero points that weren't spent are lost at the end of a session.

body.name: Using Hero Points
body.body: Each session characters start the session with 1 Hero Point they may spend for a benefit at any time. Hero Points might also be awarded for particularly heroic and risky deeds or the completion of important events or adventures. A character may not have more than 3 Hero Points at any time, and all hero points that weren't spent are lost at the end of a session.

body.name: 1 Hero Point
body.body:
• Gain advantage on attack, ability check or save.
• Impose disadvantage on an enemy save against one your spells or abilities.
• Impose disadvantage on an enemy attack or ability check used against you.
• Any other effect in-line with these uses, at the GMs discretion.
• Automatically stabilize or prevent Instant Death.

body.name: 2 Hero Points
body.body:
• Regain the uses of one ability as though you had taken a short rest. You don’t gain any other benefits of a short rest.
• Spend hitdice to regain hitpoints as if you had taken a short rest.

body.name: 3 Hero Points
body.body:
• Take an additional turn.
• Regain the uses of one ability as though you had taken a long rest. You don’t gain any other benefits of a long rest.
• Regain a spell slot of 5th level or lower.
